settings.uiPortDesc: Which port the UI should use or whether a free port is chosen automatically.
settings.presetIntro: Choose preset and enable/disable checks. Trigger commands (Supabase/Git) are set in My Shim. Save writes .shimwrappercheckrc.
settings.presetStorageHint: Presets are saved in this project. Use Export to reuse in another project.
settings.renamePresetHint: New name (also shown in My Shim):

config.title: Config (.shimwrappercheckrc)
config.description: Shell variables and comments. Used on next shim invocation.

agents.title: AGENTS.md
agents.description: Agent instructions for Cursor/Codex. Read by agents; editable here. Changes apply immediately.
agents.notExists: AGENTS.md does not exist yet. It will be created in the project root when you save.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The requested URL does not exist.

lint.label: ESLint
lint.summary: Lint (Frontend): Checks code for style issues and common error sources.
lint.info: Runs npm run lint (ESLint). Finds e.g. missing semicolons, unused variables, project rule violations.

prettier.label: Prettier
prettier.summary: Format: Consistent code formatting before push.
prettier.info: Runs Prettier (e.g. npm run format or prettier --check). Ensures consistent indentation, quotes, and line breaks.

typecheck.label: TypeScript Check
typecheck.summary: Typecheck: Verifies TypeScript types before push.
typecheck.info: Runs the TypeScript compiler (e.g. npm run typecheck or tsc --noEmit). Finds type errors without building the app.

testRun.label: Vitest
testRun.summary: Tests: Unit and integration tests – only continues if all pass.
testRun.info: Runs tests (e.g. npm run test or Vitest). Command (e.g. push/deploy) continues only when all tests pass.

projectRules.label: Project rules
projectRules.info: Runs the script scripts/checks/project-rules.sh. Checks project-specific rules (e.g. directory structure, naming, allowed imports).

npmAudit.label: npm audit
npmAudit.summary: Dependency-Security: Known vulnerabilities in npm packages.
npmAudit.info: Runs npm audit. Scans for known security issues in dependencies and warns about outdated versions. Level configurable (critical, high, moderate, low).

viteBuild.label: Vite
viteBuild.summary: Build: Ensures the frontend project builds without errors.
viteBuild.info: Runs the Vite build (e.g. npm run build). Continues only when the build succeeds – prevents broken deployments.

snyk.label: Snyk
snyk.info: Snyk dependency scan. Finds vulnerabilities npm audit may miss. Optional – only when Snyk is installed in the project.

denoFmt.label: Deno fmt
denoFmt.info: Deno format check for supabase/functions (deno fmt --check). Ensures consistent formatting of Edge Function code.

denoLint.label: Deno lint
denoLint.info: Deno linter for supabase/functions (deno lint). Finds errors and bad practice in Deno code.

denoAudit.label: Deno audit
denoAudit.info: Deno security audit for supabase/functions (deno audit). Checks Deno dependencies for known vulnerabilities.

aiReview.label: Codex
aiReview.info: Code review via Codex: Analyzes Git diff (staged/unstaged or push range), rates code quality (Rating, Warnings, Errors). PASS only with sufficient rating and no critical findings. Review saved in .shimwrapper/reviews/.

checkMockData.label: Check Mock Data
checkMockData.summary: Ensures mock data is consistent and valid.

updateReadme.label: Update README
updateReadme.summary: Updates the README before push (e.g. version from package.json).
updateReadme.info: Runs the update-README script. Keeps project documentation up to date.

sast.label: SAST
sast.summary: Static analysis: looks for typical security issues in code (planned).
sast.info: Planned / in config. Not yet implemented in run-checks.sh template.

architecture.label: Architecture
architecture.summary: Checks that project architecture follows rules (planned).
architecture.info: Planned / in config. Not yet implemented in run-checks.sh template.

complexity.label: Complexity
complexity.summary: Warns about overly complex code – e.g. deeply nested functions (planned).
complexity.info: Planned / in config. Not yet implemented in run-checks.sh template.

mutation.label: Mutation
mutation.summary: Tests whether your tests actually catch issues – via small code changes (planned).
mutation.info: Planned / in config. Not yet implemented in run-checks.sh template.

e2e.label: E2E
e2e.summary: End-to-end tests: simulates real users and tests the app from start to finish (planned).
e2e.info: Planned / in config. Not yet implemented in run-checks.sh template.

healthPing.label: Post-Deploy: Health Ping
healthPing.summary: After deploy, checks that your Supabase Functions are reachable and respond.
healthPing.info: Calls health endpoints of Edge Functions after Supabase deploy (ping-edge-health.sh). Uses Project Ref (SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF or supabase/project-ref) and optional custom paths.

edgeLogs.label: Post-Deploy: Edge Logs
edgeLogs.summary: Fetches the latest Edge Function logs after deploy – to quickly verify everything ran.
edgeLogs.info: Fetches latest logs of deployed Edge Function(s) after deploy (fetch-edge-logs.sh).
